channel.title: Invalid Client error
channel.description:
Ok, so as a couple of you know I cant make customs for my server becouse there is no class8.java file.
So, i downloaded a new client but when i click log-in it says i need a members account..
If i look at my .bat running it tells me "invalid client"
I am connecting, but the server is blocking something.

item.title: Invalid Client error
item.dc:creator: @lilgdog13 lilgdog13
item.description:
@lilgdog13 wrote:

It works on the client it came with, but when i login on at the moparscape webclient, it comes up with that message. How can i fix it to where i can login without the client? I’m sorry if i’m waisting your time, but im new at making servers.

Thanks,
Lilgdog13

Read full topic

item.title: Invalid Client error
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“lilgdog13, post:2, topic:348130”]im having the same problem. except when i login my client it works, but when i type in my ip address without a client on a moparscape client it says you need a members account. I portforwarded and eerything. I went to aa different house to try with out a router and i still got the same message. So im guessing my computter is blocking something.

Thanks,
Lilgdog13[/quote]

if it says you need a member account, the server will be receiving the connection but will be rejecting it in someway. Make sure you’re using the correct client.

Read full topic
